code: import{CHAT_GET_CONTACTS,CHAT_GET_CONTACTS_SUCCESS,CHAT_GET_CONTACTS_ERROR,CHAT_GET_CONVERSATIONS,CHAT_GET_CONVERSATIONS_SUCCESS,CHAT_GET_CONVERSATIONS_ERROR,CHAT_ADD_MESSAGE_TO_CONVERSATION,CHAT_CREATE_CONVERSATION,CHAT_SEARCH_CONTACT,CHAT_CHANGE_CONVERSATION}from'../actions';export var getContacts=function getContacts(){return{type:CHAT_GET_CONTACTS};};export var getContactsSuccess=function getContactsSuccess(contacts,currentUser){return{type:CHAT_GET_CONTACTS_SUCCESS,payload:{contacts:contacts,currentUser:currentUser}};};export var getContactsError=function getContactsError(error){return{type:CHAT_GET_CONTACTS_ERROR,payload:error};};export var getConversations=function getConversations(userId){return{type:CHAT_GET_CONVERSATIONS,payload:userId};};export var getConversationsSuccess=function getConversationsSuccess(conversations,selectedUser){return{type:CHAT_GET_CONVERSATIONS_SUCCESS,payload:{conversations:conversations,selectedUser:selectedUser}};};export var getConversationsError=function getConversationsError(error){return{type:CHAT_GET_CONVERSATIONS_ERROR,payload:error};};export var addMessageToConversation=function addMessageToConversation(currentUserId,selectedUserId,message,allConversations){return{type:CHAT_ADD_MESSAGE_TO_CONVERSATION,payload:{currentUserId:currentUserId,selectedUserId:selectedUserId,message:message,allConversations:allConversations}};};export var createConversation=function createConversation(currentUserId,selectedUserId,allConversations){return{type:CHAT_CREATE_CONVERSATION,payload:{currentUserId:currentUserId,selectedUserId:selectedUserId,allConversations:allConversations}};};export var searchContact=function searchContact(keyword){return{type:CHAT_SEARCH_CONTACT,payload:keyword};};export var changeConversation=function changeConversation(userId){return{type:CHAT_CHANGE_CONVERSATION,payload:userId};};
